alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 12:36PM PST until March 06 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SUNDAY BELOW 6500 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning above 6500 feet, heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Windy conditions Saturday could lead to areas of blowing/drifting snow, which could reduce visibility and further worsen travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County
